languages.text: {n}Ваше сердце начинает бешено колотиться, дыхание перехватывает, а кончики пальцев неприятно покалывают. Вы замечаете, что Вигдис бьет легкая дрожь, и команда недоуменно оглядывается по сторонам в поисках {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOff}источника{/d} внезапно нахлынувшего беспокойства.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ваше сердце начинает бешено колотиться, дыхание перехватывает, а кончики пальцев неприятно покалывают. Вы замечаете, что Вигдис бьет легкая дрожь, и команда недоуменно оглядывается по сторонам в поисках источника внезапно нахлынувшего беспокойства.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Your heart starts beating furiously, your breaths come short and choppy, and your fingertips tingle unpleasantly. You notice that Vigdis is shivering slightly, and the crew are glancing around in puzzlement, searching for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOff}source{/d} of this sudden wave of unease.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваше сердце начинает бешено колотиться, дыхание перехватывает, а кончики пальцев неприятно покалывают. Вы замечаете, что Вигдис бьет легкая дрожь, и команда недоуменно оглядывается по сторонам в поисках {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOff}источника{/d} внезапно нахлынувшего беспокойства.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your heart starts beating furiously, your breaths come short and choppy, and your fingertips tingle unpleasantly. You notice that Vigdis is shivering slightly, and the crew are glancing around in puzzlement, searching for the source of this sudden wave of unease.{/n}

{n}Your heart starts beating furiously, your breaths come short and choppy, and your fingertips tingle unpleasantly. You notice that Vigdis is shivering slightly, and the crew are glancing around in puzzlement, searching for the source of this sudden wave of unease.{/n}

{n}Your heart starts beating furiously, your breaths come short and choppy, and your fingertips tingle unpleasantly. You notice that Vigdis is shivering slightly, and the crew are glancing around in puzzlement, searching for the source of this sudden wave of unease.{/n}

{n}Your heart starts beating furiously, your breaths come short and choppy, and your fingertips tingle unpleasantly. You notice that Vigdis is shivering slightly, and the crew are glancing around in puzzlement, searching for the source of this sudden wave of unease.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的心脏开始剧烈跳动，呼吸变得急促，指尖也传来了令人不快的刺痛。你注意到维格迪斯正在微微发抖，而船员们则不解地四处张望，寻找这突如其来的不安的{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOff}来源{/d}。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your heart starts beating furiously, your breaths come short and choppy, and your fingertips tingle unpleasantly. You notice that Vigdis is shivering slightly, and the crew are glancing around in puzzlement, searching for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOff}source{/d} of this sudden wave of unease.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的心脏开始剧烈跳动，呼吸变得急促，指尖也传来了令人不快的刺痛。你注意到维格迪斯正在微微发抖，而船员们则不解地四处张望，寻找这突如其来的不安的来源。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの心臓は激しく鼓動し、呼吸が乱れ、指先が不快に疼く。あなたはヴィグディスが小刻みに震えているのに気付いた。そしてクルーも、この突然の不安の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOff}原因{/d}を探ろうと、周囲をキョロキョロと見回している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your heart starts beating furiously, your breaths come short and choppy, and your fingertips tingle unpleasantly. You notice that Vigdis is shivering slightly, and the crew are glancing around in puzzlement, searching for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOff}source{/d} of this sudden wave of unease.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの心臓は激しく鼓動し、呼吸が乱れ、指先が不快に疼く。あなたはヴィグディスが小刻みに震えているのに気付いた。そしてクルーも、この突然の不安の原因を探ろうと、周囲をキョロキョロと見回している。{/n}
{n}あなたの心臓は激しく鼓動し、呼吸が乱れ、指先が不快に疼く。あなたはヴィグディスが小刻みに震えているのに気付いた。そしてクルーも、この突然の不安の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOff}原因{/d}を探ろうと、周囲をキョロキョロと見回している。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein Herz beginnt wie wild zu schlagen, dein Atem ist kurz und abgehackt, und deine Fingerspitzen kribbeln unangenehm. Du bemerkst, dass Vigdis leicht zittert, und die Crew blickt sich erstaunt um, auf der Suche nach der {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOff}Ursache{/d} dieser plötzlichen Welle des Unwohlseins.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your heart starts beating furiously, your breaths come short and choppy, and your fingertips tingle unpleasantly. You notice that Vigdis is shivering slightly, and the crew are glancing around in puzzlement, searching for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOff}source{/d} of this sudden wave of unease.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dein Herz beginnt wie wild zu schlagen, dein Atem ist kurz und abgehackt, und deine Fingerspitzen kribbeln unangenehm. Du bemerkst, dass Vigdis leicht zittert, und die Crew blickt sich erstaunt um, auf der Suche nach der Ursache dieser plötzlichen Welle des Unwohlseins.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre cœur se met à battre à tout rompre, votre respiration devient difficile et saccadée, et un picotement désagréable envahit le bout de vos doigts. Vous remarquez un léger frisson parcourir Vigdis, alors que l'équipage, perplexe, cherche du regard la {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOff}source{/d} de cette soudaine sensation de malaise.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your heart starts beating furiously, your breaths come short and choppy, and your fingertips tingle unpleasantly. You notice that Vigdis is shivering slightly, and the crew are glancing around in puzzlement, searching for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOff}source{/d} of this sudden wave of unease.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre cœur se met à battre à tout rompre, votre respiration devient difficile et saccadée, et un picotement désagréable envahit le bout de vos doigts. Vous remarquez un léger frisson parcourir Vigdis, alors que l'équipage, perplexe, cherche du regard la source de cette soudaine sensation de malaise.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu corazón empieza a latir con furia, tu respiración se entrecorta y notas un hormigueo desagradable en las puntas de tus dedos. Ves que Vigdis tiembla levemente y la tripulación mira a su alrededor confusa, buscando el {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOff}origen{/d} de esta repentina inquietud.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your heart starts beating furiously, your breaths come short and choppy, and your fingertips tingle unpleasantly. You notice that Vigdis is shivering slightly, and the crew are glancing around in puzzlement, searching for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOff}source{/d} of this sudden wave of unease.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu corazón empieza a latir con furia, tu respiración se entrecorta y notas un hormigueo desagradable en las puntas de tus dedos. Ves que Vigdis tiembla levemente y la tripulación mira a su alrededor confusa, buscando el origen de esta repentina inquietud.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kalbin şiddetle atmaya başlıyor, nefesin kesik kesik bir hâl alıp istikrarsızlaşıyor, parmak uçların ise nahoş bir şekilde karıncalanıyor. Vigdis'in hafif hafif titrediğini ve mürettebatın kafası karışık bir hâlde etrafa bakınarak bu ani huzursuzluk dalgasının {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOff}kaynağını{/d} bulmaya çalıştığını fark ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your heart starts beating furiously, your breaths come short and choppy, and your fingertips tingle unpleasantly. You notice that Vigdis is shivering slightly, and the crew are glancing around in puzzlement, searching for the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOff}source{/d} of this sudden wave of unease.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kalbin şiddetle atmaya başlıyor, nefesin kesik kesik bir hâl alıp istikrarsızlaşıyor, parmak uçların ise nahoş bir şekilde karıncalanıyor. Vigdis'in hafif hafif titrediğini ve mürettebatın kafası karışık bir hâlde etrafa bakınarak bu ani huzursuzluk dalgasının kaynağını bulmaya çalıştığını fark ediyorsun.{/n}
